Name.label: Autosomal dominant progressive nephropathy with hypertension

TextSection.Contents: A rare, genetic hypertension characterized by an adult onset of increased blood pressure associated with nephropathy progressing to end-stage renal disease. Renal biopsy may show interstitial fibrosis, glomerulosclerosis and mild tubular atrophy. Increased serum creatinine and proteinuria have also been reported.

Name.label: E (exact mapping (the terms and the concepts are equivalent))
